english.#aAp1: Armenia ‚Äì acknowledged as one of the cradles of civilization ‚Äì is a beautiful country with a long and cultured history. It is an intriguing tourist destination and is recognised as one of the most safe countries in the world. Numerous monuments and masterpieces of the Ancient Era and Middle Ages can be found throughout the country!
english.#aAp2: Miracles, wonders and adventures can be found on the land where Noah landed and traces of centuries are hidden everywhere. Gain the memories which will never leave you through our tours!
english.#wwusli1p1: We provide our clients with unforgettable and enjoyable travelling, with guaranteed services that exceed their expectations.
english.#wwusli2p1: Our tours are completely based on your interests and schedule.
english.#wwusli3p1: We pride ourselves in offering excellent, speedy and expert service to ensure you will enjoy a very rewarding travel in Armenia

armavir.#mp1: The map of Armenia is like a face of a lady. Armavir is the province that is located in the chin part of the face. Armavir might be called Vatican of Armenia, since Etchmiadzin, the holy city, where there is Mother Cathedral, is in this province. Armavir has also a very important military significance. In Sardarapat there is the Memorial complex, a museum that represents to its visitors the important battle in the history of Armenia. Tour packages to Etchmiadzin, Zvartnots cathedral and Sardarapat are very popular travel with tourists from all over the world. Tourists from Voronezh, Rostov, Samara, European and Asian cities visit here all year round.

yerevan.#mp1: The heart, the capital of Armenia, Yerevan, the plan of which was designed by architect Alexander Tamanyan, is one of the safest cities in the world. Its sister cities are Los Angeles, Riga, Sao Paulo, Isfahan, Volgograd, Odessa, etc. Tour operators as well as the Municipality suggest tours in Yerevan, on a big red bus, walking, travel group or private. Holidays in Yerevan are full of new information and leisure, since all the streets, monuments, buildings have a history or story to tell.

lori.#mp1: Lori is one of the greenest regions of Armenia. When saying Lori, the Armenians first of all connect it with the famous Armenian poet Hovhannes Tumanyan and actor Sos Sargsyan. Any visitor may find an interesting peculiarity here: Sanahin and Haghpat monasteries, that are under the protection of UNESCO, Akhtala monastery unique due to its frescos and the annual festival of barbeque, travel to Odzun monastery, Dsegh, where Tumanyan‚Äôs house museum is, the house museum of Mikoyan brothers, which is very popular with guests from Saint Petersburg, Moscow, Yekaterinburg, Dendropark, which is visited all year long, and particularly in the period of pollination, Lori fortress, etc.

artsax.#mp1: Artsakh Republic (Nagorno Karbakh Republic), can be reached from Armenia from via Syunik province and via Gegharkunik province. The capial of Artsakh is Stepanakert. The architect of Stepanakert is the same great Alexander Tamanayan, who drew the plan of the capital of Armenia, Yerevan. Tour to Artsakh are available almost all year long. The sightseeing places in Artsakh that guests from Moscow, St. Petersburg, Rostov, Voronezh, Yekaterinburg, etc. can easily buy tours to are as follow: Stepanakert, Shoushi, dadivank Monastery, Gandzasar Monastery, Tigrnakert, Askeran, Jdrduz, travel to Hunot gorge /Umbrellas/.

gexarquniq.#mp1: If you look at the map of Armenia, you will see a face of a lady with curly hair with a brooch in it. This brooch is Lake Sevan in Gegharkunik province. The water in the lake is fresh. And the Sevan trout is well-known among the local and tourists. Sights of interest that Gegharkunik province suggest to its visitors from Samara, Krasnodar, Nizhny Novgorod, Moscow and many other cities during their holidays are Sevanavank Monastery on the peninsula, Hayravank, Noratous, and those who prefer extreme tours and may buy travel packages with hiking to Mount Azhdahak, Mount Artanish, Mount Armaghan.

ararat.#mp1: Ararat is one the eleven provinces of Armenia. Khor Virap, one of the three holy places in Armenia, is located in Ararat province. From here a very beautiful view to the Mount Ararat is opening /nowadays the mountain is on the territory of Turkey/. For those who like hiking tours may take a tour package to Urtsasar, which may also become a pilgrimage, since St. Karapet church, one of the pilgrimage places in Armenia, is located in Urtsadzor. You can buy both a group or a private tour to Khor Virap, as for Urtsasar, it is mainly a private tour.

tavush.#mp1: The greenest region of Armenia, Tavush has a border pass with Georgia, Bagratashen. The list of the sights of interests guests from different countries and the locals may visit is realy vast: Goshavank monastery, Haghartsin monastery, lake Gosh, lake Parz, Matosavank monastery, Makaravank monastery, Ijevan dendropark, Dilijan ‚Äì old city, Yell Park, Lastiver, etc. The tours to Tavush might be classical, hiking, extreme, etc. The holidays in this region promise to be top interesting travel.

kotayq.#mp1: Kotayk is so called inner region of Armenia. If all the other nine regions have borders with neighbor countries, Kotayk has only with other regions. Tours to Kotayk region cover many sightseeing places: Garni, Geghard, Tsaghkadzor, as well as recreational spa cities such as Bjni, Arzni, Hankavan. Guests from Voronezh, Samara, Moscow, Yekaterinburg, Krasnodar and other parts of Russia and not only, who buy packages to spend their holidays in Armenia always include tours to these places in Kotayk region, since Garni is the only pagan temple on the territory, Geghard Monastery and the Symphony of Stones are in the UNESCO heritage list, in Tsaghkadzor one can buy a ticket and take the cable car, etc.

aragatsotn.#mp1: Aragatsotn province might be called a mixture of science, religion and nature. Byurakan Observatory, well-known all over the world, a number of churches and monasteries, and of course the highest summit on the territory of Armenia, Aragats /4090m/. The latter has four summits /North, South, Eastern, Western/. And tours to each of them have their seasonality. This region is interesting for travel both the local and tourists from Moscow, Saint Petersburg, Nizhny Novgorod and many other Russian cities. In case you have an intention to get to the summits, buy your holiday tour package on the second part of summer.

shirak.#mp1: Shirak is one of the driest and coldest /in winter/ or coolest /in summer/ region, but at the same moment not less interesting then any other region of Armenia. The capital city Gyumri is the artistic center of Armenia. If ever in Gyumri buy mushurba or klklan, which is the symbol of the city. Gyumri is rich in museums, monuments and historically important other peculiarities. Tour packages to Shirak may include Harichavank monastery, Marmashen, Ani Pemza, Yereruyk, Gyumri, travel to Trchkan waterfall, etc. The border pas with Georgia country is Bavra.

syuniq.#mp1: The biggest region in the southern part or Armenia is Syunik. Tours to Syunik are taken to many of sightseeing places such as Karahunj or Zorats Karer, the ancient observatory, Shaki waterfall, Tatev monastery, Tatever cable car /listed in Genius book/, Halidzor, Khndzoresk cave village. It is in Syunik where Armenia has a border pass with Iran. Tour packages with overnight in Syunik are to be comfortable due to the existence of many comfortable hotel and B&B-s here. Tourists from Samara, Voronezh, Yekaterinburg, Rostov, Nizhny Novgorod, etc., who prefer not long driving will surely prefer tours to Syunik with an overnight.

vayocDzor.#mp1: The region of wine and winery, Vayouts Dzor is interesting for tourists from Saint Petersburg, Moscow, Yekatinburg, Krasnodar, Rostov, Nizhny Novgorod and other cities from all over the world. Here one take part in the harvest of grapes, wine festival, visit the most ancient winery on the territory of Armenia, as well as buy tour packages to Jermuk, spa resort city, travel to Noravank unique monastery, visit Yeghegis, the Jewish graveyard, etc. Jermuk is well-known thanks to the mental waters, waterfall and resorts.

artsvashen.#mp1: Artsvashen (Azerbaijani: Ba≈ük…ônd), an exclave of the Gegharkunik region of Armenia in the territory of the Republic of Azerbaijan [1]. It has been occupied by the Azerbaijani Armed Forces since August 8, 1992. According to the administrative division of Azerbaijan, it is located in the Getabek region, according to the administrative division of Armenia, it is located in the Gegharkunik region.

english.#au_cardp1: TIA has been operating successfully in the Armenian tourism market since 2011. The company organizes internal, inbound and outbound tours. Our agency specializes in organizing tours and excursions in Armenia, Nagorno-Karabakh, Georgia and Georgia
english.#au_cardp2: We are a team of enthusiastic professionals who believe in the success of a job done with love, and we love the work we do
english.#au_cardp3: In 2019, we were recognized as the best travel company of the year, according to the Armenia Touristicheskaya Awards
english.#au_cardp4: Our goal is to make Armenia an attractive tourist center in the world:
english.#au_cardp5: Direct  Open Communication Rapid Response Teamwork Flexibility  Willingness to Accept Changes Proper Risk Calculation Quality Assurance
english.#au_cardp6: We strive to be an innovative, guiding tour operator, to show a creative approach at every stage of the journey, to occupy our position in the market among the best travel agencies, and to be recognized due to our professionalism and high quality
english.#au_cards4: At the heart of our tours are your desires. We provide our customers with a wide range of services, such as:
english.#au_cardp7:
Educational tours excursions to historic places in Armenia
Individual tours
Kitchen tours
Kitchen tours Active tourism adventure tours
Entertainment tours
Business meetings conferences organization
High quality transport services, etc
english.#au_contactp3: For daily tours and general surveys

Armenia has favorable conditions for organizing adventure tours. By purchasing our travel packages, you will be able to become interested in participating and unforgettable adventure tours, which include marches, climbers, visiting caves, jeeps, etc. d. This is a great opportunity to make your visit more memorable

english.#everyDayTours1: We organize daily trips in Yerevan and throughout Armenia. Even the most demanding tourist can choose a suitable option from the list of our 1-day tours. Our daily tours start in Yerevan and include visits to numerous sightseeing places of Armenia, Nagorno Karabakh and Georgia. Don‚Äôt hesitate to choose one of these unique tours and enjoy Armenia with us.
